arcade.core.env.location

Interface LocationFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PatchLocationFactory, PatchLocationFactoryHex, PatchLocationFactoryRect, PottsLocationFactory, PottsLocationFactory2D, PottsLocationFactory3D

    public interface LocationFactory
    Factory class for Location objects.

    The factory manages the creation of Location objects by either:

    • Loading existing LocationContainer instances from a given file
    • Generating new LocationContainer instances based on population settings

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createLocations(Series series)
      Creates location containers from population settings.
      void initialize(Series series, ec.util.MersenneTwisterFast random)
      Initializes the factory for the given series.
      void loadLocations(Series series)
      Loads location containers into the factory container.
